remarks: A finitely supported function in ` S ` has its ` X ` -th element in ` S ( X ) ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)  Obsolete version of ~ dprdfcl as of 11-Jul-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
dprdffOLD.w $e |- W = { h e. X_ i e. I ( S ` i ) | ( `' h " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin } $.

dprdfclOLD $p |- ( ( ph /\ X e. I ) -> ( F ` X ) e. ( S ` X ) ) $.
